SEARCH
Package server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Main server class. Accepts new client connections and manages persistent data stores.
Since:
2025-10-20

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point for the Server application.

      This method initializes the server and keeps it running indefinitely to accept incoming client connections. It performs the following steps:

      1. Loads persistent data (users and messages) from disk into memory via loadData().
      2. Opens a ServerSocket on the specified PORT.
      3. Enters an infinite loop to listen for connection requests.
      4. When a client connects, accepts the Socket and delegates the processing to a ClientHandler managed by a thread pool for concurrent execution.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used in this application).

    • registerUser

      public static boolean registerUser(User user)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object.
      Returns:
      true if success, false if user already exists.

    • userExists

      public static boolean userExists(String username)
      Checks if a user exists for login.
      Parameters:
      username - The username.
      Returns:
      true if user exists, false otherwise.

    • storeMessage

      public static void storeMessage(String username, byte[] encryptedData)
      Stores an encrypted message for a user.
      Parameters:
      username - The user.
      encryptedData - The message.

    • getMessage

      public static byte[] getMessage(String username)
      Retrieves the encrypted message for a user.
      Parameters:
      username - The user.
      Returns:
      The encrypted message as byte[], or null if not found.

    • loadData

      private static void loadData()
      Loads user and message data from files into memory.

    • saveData

      private static void saveData()
      Saves the current user and message maps to files.

    • loadMapFromFile

      private static <K, V> Map<K,V> loadMapFromFile(String path)
      Helper to load a generic Map from a file.
      Parameters:
      path - The file path.
      Returns:
      The loaded Map, or a new ConcurrentHashMap if file not found.

    • saveMapToFile

      private static <K, V> void saveMapToFile(Map<K,V> map, String path)
      Helper to save a generic Map to a file.
      Parameters:
      map - The map to save.
      path - The file path.
